posts.post_content:
Raw Johnson with glove.
VG to VG/EX appearance.

Was graded PSA A -

I do not know exactly why the "Auth" grade. I don't think it's trimmed, but cannot make any guarantees. I think there is an erasure of a pencil mark on the back.

Anyways, a really nice looking card IMO.

Asking sold Shipped. I can take PP/FF.

Thanks
